name: Whips & Shovels
description:
Whips and Shovels is a simple versus fighting game.

To fit the theme of duality, we chose a shovel and a whip, as the title suggests.

Why?

Well, it isn't only because of the basic melee / distance duality.

What inspired us was beyond :

The shovel has multiple use modes (it can dig, move dirt, knock out, split a skull) while the whip doesn't. The shovel is short and hard, the whip is long and flexible.

Note :

The soundtrack is Brinstar Depths from the game Super Metroid.

We do not own nor claim the soundrack from Super Metroid or any copyrighted material, and will take this game down if any of the copyright owners request that I do so.
